examples.korean: We haven't received his resignation yet. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리는 아직 그의 사직서를 받지 못했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We haven't received his resignation yet. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He has tendered his resignation to the Prime Minister. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 수상에게 사직서를 제출했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He has tendered his resignation to the Prime Minister. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She handed in her resignation and was put on three months’ gardening leave. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀가 사직서를 제출했지만 3개월간 재취업 유보 휴가로 처리되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She handed in her resignation and was put on three months’ gardening leave. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: It is with great regret that I accept your resignation. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 당신의 사직서를 수리하게 된 것을 대단히 애석하게 생각합니다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It is with great regret that I accept your resignation. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She imagined walking into the office and handing in her resignation. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 그 사무실 안으로 걸어 들어가 사직서를 제출하는 것을 (마음속으로) 그려 보았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She imagined walking into the office and handing in her resignation. Add to Wordbook
